I'd be sitting in the same old bar
Heart breaking on a broken bar stool
Wishing she'd come running back

'Cause I'd never found you
At that random house party that I didn't even wanna go to

I'm a private investigator that randomly followed a subject to this guys concert with Jason Aldean and Chris Young. That's how I weirdly discovered this guy. lol

I'm from the 3rd smallest state in the country ..a couple years ago, I moved to one of the biggest cities, Los Angeles...I felt lost in such a HUGE city, but then I started listening to country music to take me back where there wasnt traffic, hecticness, and people everywhere every 2 seconds ....i was introduced to this song not too long ago, but got roped in by "what ifs" by kane brown.  I moved to Los Angeles because I rap/sing ..so in honor of what country did for me during that time, I makefreestyles to country hits..  If you want to hear my freestyle to kane brown's "found you..then here it is: https://soundcloud.com/joeynatomusic/found-you-country-rap

I'm going to see your concert in Ruidoso, I'm hoping I can take a pic with you even though I'm not on your meet and greet list but I'm your oldest fan. I knew you were going to be a star when I first heard What Ifs video, I hope if you read this comment I will be on the floor hope  I will be able to stand up for the concert, even though I probably be your oldest fan. I Will be the one with white hair.Kane I hope you read this comment.

Joey Nato ....Dude! Man I 've been a musician for almost 30 years. The last 3 or 4, because of carpel tunnel and circumstances I let it get stagnant. I sold all my guitars, my cakewalk and fruity loops along with most of my studio equipment. Deppressed is all i really got from it. The last few months I've had a fire lit under me and for some reason running across this comment with this link to this song really added to my flame! Thanks man. You got something bro! Don't stop !
